content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To prevent unauthorized access, all Company offices are locked and can be opened using electronic access cards issued to each employee. The offices cannot be entered without an access card, so each Employee is ensuring that entrance doors are always closed after entering or leaving the office.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Access to EPAM premises is regulated by assigning an access level personally to each employee. Details about access rules in each location can be found in \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Security policy\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" section of \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/policy/belarus/minsk.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee Handbook\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In particular, the following instructions regulate access rules to EPAM offices:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"in Belarus: WI “\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/SitePages/Policy/Work Instructions/Local Work Instructions/Work Instructions - UA/Work Instruction IT Security - UA.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IT Security UA\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"”\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Specific projects may have additional security policy stipulating security rules in ODC or within EPAM area. Project Manager must inform project members in such cases and provide additional clarification if needed.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If an employee is dismissed or relocated to another country, he/she must return e-card to Physical Security department (on their own or via office services). Returned e-cards must be invalidated as soon as possible.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To learn how to process requests about access to EPAM offices, study information in article \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/_XkZFw\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Access to EPAM Offices\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/-vCUFg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Access to parking in EPAM\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
